subtitle: This winter warmer is quick and simple to prepare and bound to be popular with all the family.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large bowl on 100% FULL power for 2 min. Add the onions and cook on 100% FULL POWER for 3 min. Add the meat and mix well.

Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 2 min. 
Stir, cook on 100% FULL POWER for 2 min. Add the tomato puree, chilli powder, paprika and seasoning, mixing well.
Drain the kidney beans, reserving the juice and making up to 250 ml with water. Add the liquid to the meat.

Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 10 min. Leave to stand for 5min. 
Stir in the kidney beans, then cook on 100% FULL power for 5-10 min. 
Skim off the surplus fat and adjust the seasoning before serving.
